trans-unit.source: Converts instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte instâncias de <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> de e para outros tipos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Expression> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Expression>tipo não deve utilizar um caminho de conversor de tipo ao converter valores (deve utilizar as extensões de markup em vez disso,).</xref:System.Windows.Expression>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Por este motivo, <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>sempre devolver `false`.</xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName> always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName>sempre acionar uma excepção.</xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertTo%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.ExpressionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # Utilização de texto XAML

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.ExpressionConverter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert from a source object to an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve se este conversor pode converter de um objeto de origem para um <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert from.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter de.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this converter can convert an <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to a specific destination type.
trans-unit.target: Devolve se este conversor pode converter um <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> objeto para um tipo de destino específico.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided value to the <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Converte o valor fornecido para o <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a converter.

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emite uma exceção e devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Converts the provided <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"></xref> object to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Converte fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Expression"> </xref> objeto para o tipo especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que fornece um contexto de formato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> to use as the current culture.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>para utilizar como a cultura atual.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a converter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type you wish to convert to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Type>que representa o tipo de que pretende converter.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Always throws an exception and returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre emite uma exceção e devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
